lead_paragraph: A study of a widely used security system for Internet shopping, banking and other services showed that it failed to work correctly in a small number of cases.

headline.seo: Researchers Find Flaw in an Online Encryption Method
headline.main: Flaw Found in an Online Encryption Method
headline.print_headline: Researchers Find a Flaw in a Widely Used Online Encryption Method

abstract: Team of European and American researchers discovers an unexpected weakness in the encryption system widely used for online shopping, banking, e-mail and other supposedly secure Internet services; flaw, which has to do with the way the system generates random numbers, may affect confidence in Web transactions.
snippet: A study of a widely used security system for Internet shopping, banking and other services showed that it failed to work correctly in a small number of cases.
